column3: Faculty of Health and Life Sciences
column5: As key contributors to modern healthcare, including disease diagnosis, monitoring of therapy and research into disease mechanisms, specialist and senior biomedical scientists are in great demand both within the NHS and private hospital laboratories.You can now study this course via multiple pathways:
column7: UK Fees: 2022/23 fees TBC*;2021/22 fees - 10400 | 15450 (with professional experience)  International Fees: 2022/23 fees TBC*;2021/22 fees - 16600 | 18950 (with professional experience)
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time, 20 months full time with professional experience
